backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for user profiles, goals, run logs, motivation, and achievements with access control and comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved components, related files, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing page components, UI elements, hooks, and system utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React application and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Ach: Displays all achievements with locked/earned states, icons, descriptions, and unlock dates using a catalog.
Sign-in/sign-out button managing Internet Identity login flow with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuestModeBa: Alert banner informing users they are in guest mode and offering a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first‑time profile setup allowing users to enter a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, social links, and bottom navigation, wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/motivation/Celeb: Displays a celebratory alert listing newly unlocked achievements or hides if none exist.
frontend/src/components/motivation/Motiv: Shows a motivational message, daily progress, and goal details with loading skeleton support.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a fixed mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware highlighting and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Shows a reminder alert prompting users to log a run based on preferences and completion state.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorCall: Displays an error alert with optional retry action.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAchievemen: Fetches user achievements using the actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Aggregates goals, logs, achievements, motivation message, and streak data into a dashboard summary.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useGoals.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save user goals with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useRunLogs.ts: Fetches run logs and supports adding new logs with related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrincipal.ts: Returns the caller's principal or 'guest' if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and base typography.
frontend/src/lib/achievementsCatalog.ts: Defines an achievement catalog interface and exports a static list of predefined achievements.
frontend/src/lib/preferences.ts: Loads and saves per‑user reminder preferences to localStorage with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/streak.ts: Provides functions for checking if today's run is completed, computing streaks, and formatting distances.
frontend/src/lib/submitGuards.ts: Prevents duplicate form submissions within a short time window by hashing form data.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates run log duration and distance, returning error messages for invalid fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with profile setup, status cards, banners, and streak/achievement summaries.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays recent run logs with loading and error states and allows navigating to run details.
frontend/src/pages/LogRunPage.tsx: Form for logging a run with validation, duplicate‑submit prevention, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/RunLogDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected run log, handling loading, errors, and navigation back to history.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for managing daily goals and reminder preferences, including validation and save actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI styling.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, issues, and branding requirements for the running motivation app.
